General.Name: King’s Town Bank
General.Description: King's Town Bank Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides various personal and corporate banking products and services in Taiwan. It accepts check deposits and other deposits; issues financial bonds; and offers loan, bill discounting, investment business, and domestic and foreign exchange services. The company also provides draft acceptance, domestic and foreign letter of credit and guarantees, collection and advances, depository and agency services, and operates other business chartered by the government. In addition, it offers leasing, securities brokage, and construction management services. The company was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 506 Ximen Road, Tainan City, Taiwan
